item.title: Teaching
item.description: During my stay in Sweden, from 2008 to 2015, I taught two courses at the Mster level for Mathematicians, Biologists and Physicists. 2013 : Mathematical Biology webpage description General formulation Diseases and epidemics Populations Biochemical kinetics Turing patterns Evolutionary Biology Projects ( first | second | third) 2009- 2011 : Applied Dynamical Systems webpage description Survey of self-organisation phenomena and complex non-linear phenomena Quantitative formulation Dynamical systems governed By ordinary differential equations One variable systems part I : Two variables â€“ part II : The Diffusion equation Spatially extended systems Projects ( first | second | third)
